[[File:Lésion bulleuse.jpg|vignette|Bulle tendue à contenu clair siégeant sur le dessus du pied ]]

properties.question: What is the primary characteristic of a bullous lesion as seen in Bullous dermatosis affecting the skin and/or external mucous membranes?
properties.option_a: A flat, discolored area on the skin surface
properties.option_b: A raised, solid-colored patch on the skin surface
properties.option_c: A fluid-filled blister with a clear or cloudy content
properties.option_d: A small, itchy rash with red bumps
